cause.description:
This is to help save our horses, our friends fom being killed. Some of these horses could be a little girl's best friend. Babies could grow up to be champions, and older horses could be groomed and live the rest of their lives in a field, happy. This is a cause close to my heart and I know it effects all equine lovers. No matter what the cost, we can save these horses, our friends.
1. It must end, if gradually.
2. Horses are NOT food, they have feelings.
3. Horses have rights, and those rights don't include being in a french resteraunt.
cause.mission: Protect horses from slaughter and protect foals from being killed off from PMU farms.
cause.name: Save us from slaughter!
